statements: UPDATE LeadScoring SET total_score = total_score + 10 WHERE lead_id = 1;
UPDATE LeadScoring SET form_submission_score = 50, website_interaction_score = 30 WHERE user_id = 100;
UPDATE LeadScoring SET total_score = total_score + 10, website_interaction_score = 20 WHERE lead_id = 101
UPDATE LeadScoring SET form_submission_score = 30, total_score = 50 WHERE user_id = 201
UPDATE Lead_Interactions SET page_visited = 'www.example.com' WHERE lead_id = 1;
UPDATE Form_Submissions SET submission_data = '{"name": "John Doe", "email": "john@example.com"}' WHERE form_id = 2;
UPDATE Lead_Interactions SET interaction_time = '2022-01-20 12:30:00', page_visited = '/contact-us.html' WHERE lead_id = 1001;
UPDATE Form_Submissions SET submission_data = '{"name": "John Doe", "email": "john.doe@example.com"}', form_name = 'Contact Form' WHERE form_id = 2004;
UPDATE leads SET lead_interaction_count = 10 WHERE lead_id = 'c6cfd092-3f41-4d80-b5b6-80ba7bf35532';
UPDATE form_submissions SET form_name = 'Contact Form' WHERE lead_id = 'c6cfd092-3f41-4d80-b5b6-80ba7bf35532';
UPDATE leads SET lead_interaction_count = 10 WHERE lead_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Clicked' WHERE lead_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Lead_Interactions SET interaction_type = 'Clicked' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Form_Submissions SET submission_data = '{"name": "John Doe", "email": "johndoe@example.com"}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Lead_Interactions SET interaction_type='Click' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Form_Submissions SET submission_data='{"email": "test@example.com", "name": "John Doe"}' WHERE form_id=2 AND id=3;
UPDATE users SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET phone_number='+1234567890', name='Alice' WHERE user_id='223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '1234567890' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE users SET name = 'John Doe', company_name = 'ABC Inc' WHERE user_id = '456e7890-e12e-34b5-c678-901234567890';
